title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression row[0]
description: When setting a filter expression such as 'row[0] equals to 0', the data set returns incorrect results or a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: Instead, when setting an invalid filter expression such as 'row[0] equals to 0', some relevant error message should pop up.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'. 2. Click on the Preview tab.
